func.title: SortArrayByArrayElement

param.name: array2sort
param.desc: Array that is to be sorted

param.name: element_index
param.desc: Index of element in sub-array by which sorting should happen

param.name: descending
param.desc: If true, elements are sorted in descending (highest to lowest) order. Otherwise ascending order.

func.desc: Sorts an array of arrays by a subarray element. All elements must be arrays of at least element_index+1 size. Subarray elements should be either all strings or all integer.
